message:
SYSTEM: TIC-vigilance-en-v0%28maria%29.pdf: Página 2
Pilot project on ontologies for TIC vigilance
• Collaboration with the Secretary of State for 
Telecommunications and Information Society 
• Problem:
• Different organizations and locations use different schemes 
(CPV, UNSPSC, ad-hoc…) and classification for products
and services. 
• Heterogeneity through dataset annotated with different 
schemes
• Need for query translation (when using another schema)
• Reuse:
• Ontological resources
• foaf, org, GoodRelations, SKOS…
• Non-Ontological resources
• propietary database
• csv files
2
speaker: SYSTEM
